headline: PulteGroup Survey: Pondering 60, Gen X’s Alternative Streak Still Strong
summary: ATLANTA, August 12, 2025--Suddenly, sixteen candles aren’t nearly enough: Having long ago traded mosh pits for minivans, the first members of Generation X are turning 60 in 2025. And while so much has changed for the generation that brought us grunge music, flannel as a fashion statement and teen angst as a movie genre, Gen X’s fierce independent streak remains stronger than ever – and it’s making an impact on what they want from the next chapter of life.
